html:
11.8.17  5:50 pm   Actually, Sesame Street IS a real street: A dirt road in the middle of no where. look it up on a map!

     i never doubted it was real

11.8.17  5:50 pm   What is your opinion on cognitive behavioral therapy?

     sounds like a fancy word for being alive

11.8.17  5:45 pm   what would you talk about if you had to give a ted talk

     ted

11.8.17  5:09 pm   No offense, but do you like coleslaw?

     not really

11.8.17  5:05 pm   how to stop the little explosions that go off in my brain??

     try bigger explosions

11.8.17  4:54 pm   can you answer this question with more than 3 sentences? 

     that doesn't seem necessary

11.8.17  4:47 pm   do you consider yourself crazy

     i'm doing the best i can

11.8.17  4:23 pm   why do all my questions get rejected?

     which ones were yours

11.8.17  4:19 pm   You are responding to a lot of questions lately.

     probably less than before, but still a lot

     Do you have somebody else to help you with the question?

     no

     If you have, and it's somebody else answering, you would say that it's not you?

11.8.17  3:54 pm   Are you a boy?

     i will check

11.8.17  3:48 pm   I forgot how much is 1 + 1, can you please help me?

     not right now

11.8.17  3:26 pm   mr wurtz i enjoy calling you this. it gives me a rush, a sexual rush if you want to label it. that is all, have a neat day mr wurtz.

     i think the rush you are having is for someone else. i don't identify with that name. it does not sound like me, it does not feel like me. when you say it, it does not refer to me, and the person you are imagining when you say it does not have a resemblence to me

11.8.17  2:49 pm   Do you have a mental disorder?

     you'll have to specify what the correct order is

11.8.17  2:39 pm   Does anyone help with your vids/do you have any editors?

     no

11.8.17  1:50 pm   Have you ever been Rick-rolled?

     only in the simulator

     And have you Rick-rolled anybody?

     yes

11.8.17  1:44 pm   You have a car, but that is bad. That is a cool fact. Why isn't there an awesome fact of you?

     how about this

11.8.17  1:15 pm   aaaaaaaaaaaaAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHH

     you make a great point, sandy, and i know the folks at home can relate

11.8.17  1:05 pm   I keep asking things to my wall, but the answers are so soft I can't really listen. Is there a way to amplify it?

     dmt

11.8.17  1:02 pm   10.17.17  11:40 pm thanks for answering. sorry, but even after rereading the original question (10.17.17  11:40 pm ) i don't see the difference.

     i don't either ... you posted 2 links to the same question

      anyway, i think after the movie the characters stop existing in the movie, but they still exist in our minds in another form.

11.8.17  12:03 pm   why does everyone make a wish at 11:11?

     so that hopefully it will come true by 11:12

11.8.17  11:41 am   follow up question... is sesame street a real place?

     yes but it might not have all the puppets

     and if so, why have they not hired you to do their theme song?

     i think they already have one

11.8.17  9:58 am   since everyone always seems to ask you to change the numbers on the wall to "420",

     what they don't understand is that it already said 420 when i first got here, and i changed it because that seemed boring and unimaginative. i am a bit disappointed that everyone is suggesting i switch it back to 420, as if that is the more creative option

      have you considered rearranging the numbers to any of the four other remaining permutations as a fun exercise

     yes but i have ruled them out. 240 is by far the strongest, to me

11.8.17  9:51 am   has anyone actually guessed correctly the specific content of you video based on the instagram hints?

     sure. for example when i posted a picture of soap, some people guessed that i was doing a video about soap. that was true

11.8.17  7:52 am   If we make an artificial intelligence, could we just ask it to make a time machine? Would it work? After all, computers can be pretty smart.

     i think you would need to clarify what time machine means

11.8.17  7:43 am   how can I deal with the occasional angst and frustrations?

     draw pictures

11.8.17  6:42 am   What's in your secret sauce?

     nothing

11.8.17  4:26 am   10.12.17  9:16 pm Do you think that the dynamic aspect of digital and electronic media is a solely good thing?

     the option is available, which is helpful and useful. if you don't want it you can turn it off, so there is also that option. i'm not sure if that answers your question

11.8.17  2:21 am   do you think the english alphabet and spelling would be better if it corresponded more clearly to pronunciation?

     i think it's just fine the way it is. it has nice character

11.8.17  2:01 am   can you answer this question without answering?

     i will see what i can do

11.8.17  12:22 am   if i like the parts in songs where the composer throws in a bunch of quick key changes to add interest to that part, is it okay to do something like that but for the entire song so it would be interesting throughout? 

     sure but it might get really confusing sounding

11.8.17  12:18 am   Can you write a song that goes through most of the diatonic chords but never use the 1 chord? 

     sure, but i wouldn't really want to be goal oriented from that mindset

11.7.17  10:44 pm   What did I do to make you suddenly stop answering my very important and urgent questions? I'm sorry. I'd just really like to know. Then I'm done.

     which ones were yours

11.7.17  10:19 pm   Would you say you have a fairly average life?

     absolutely not

11.7.17  10:02 pm   AAG FUCKING KILL ME. Whats the one thing I think my music teacher told everyone to do. DON"T BRING HOME YOUR MUSIC BINDER. what did I do. BRING HOME THE FUCKING MUSIC BINDER. what's the one thing my sister told me to do COMPLETE THE I/O DIAGRAM FOR THE PROJECT THAT WAS DUE BEFORE. what did I do. NOT THAT. what did I tell myself before school started. TRY YOUR BEST AT EVERYTHING. what did I do. NOT THAT. But I still don't want to try my best at homework. But I still want to get it done. But I can't cause I'm not doing that, like I also want.  The thing I'm most upset about is the binder. It inconvenienced my teacher, and was caused by me just being forgetful.

     oh if you think that's embarassing, you should check out the vietnam war

11.7.17  9:38 pm   Do you like sparking water?

     no

      And how does it compare for you to regular tap water? Thanks

     from what i understand, it doesn't particularly help with hydration. so if that is what you are looking for, it's not a good choice

11.7.17  8:53 pm   what does it sound like when doves cry?

     some catchy triads, i suppose

11.7.17  8:37 pm   is the earth flat mr. wurtz

     it depends how you look at it. please don't call me mr. wurtz

11.7.17  8:25 pm   Do you like that cake by the ocean song?  

     yes, except for the title line. and i much prefer the version that says "fuckin". i also can't remember how the verse goes

11.7.17  7:49 pm   have you theorized what exactly would happen if you were to combine soap with soap?

     i think you just get a bunch of soap
11.7.17  7:27 pm   What's the "240" mean in your room (taken from your picture on instagram)?

11.7.17  7:25 pm   How would you describe what you do

     why won't anyone just let me do it instead, without having to describe it, in addition

     and why people enjoy it

     ? are you really asking me and not them

     to someone who has never heard of you (me) and has come here to ask a question without looking at any of your work (yet (also me))

     somehow it seems like you're going about this all wrong

11.7.17  7:07 pm   this page has a rhythm! that's one of the reasons you hate putting in big questions and answers

     i don't hate big questions, nor big answers. but i respect your opinion

11.7.17  7:06 pm   what is the longest question on this page?

     yours maybe

11.7.17  7:04 pm   Why did you stop making notes and anagrams?

     you gotta be kidding me. i post a new anagram every day. looks like you're not really paying attention. i actually often make 4 or 5 a day, but i only post one a day to keep it spaced out evenly

11.7.17  6:34 pm   i want to be bill wurtz how do I do it?

     first you will have to negotiate with the person who is currently doing it, and convince them to do something else instead. then, you'll have to convince someone else to start being you, if you're not gonna do it anymore

11.7.17  6:24 pm   what are you reading?

     your question

11.7.17  6:24 pm   when is your next video?

     i always finish them as quickly as possible, and then immediately start on the next one

11.7.17  6:18 pm   what do you do if you get sick?

     chill the hell out

11.7.17  5:35 pm   Why is the school system so messed up?

     because you haven't fixed it yet

11.7.17  5:25 pm   what happens if no one likes my lame music but it's the only music I know how to make

     my next question is do you like it
